content: **introduction ** the rocket pop scrubby is a fun u s a tribute to a summer time favorite treat in red white and blue of course you can knit yours up in any colors you like you can also choose to knit it in one or two colors rather than three working flat you will knit garter stitch fabric until we reach the top of the popsicle shaping with simple decreases to finish the popsicle up and finally picking up and knitting an i-cord at the base of the popsicle to give it that popsicle stick appearance whether you re knitting for personal use or to sell this pattern is a joy to create if using this pattern for sales please credit me as the designer happy knitting **skills** this project is suited for knitters who are comfortable to work in or who are open to learning the following skills and techniques bind-off cast-on knit knit 2 together pick-up stitches knit an i-cord not familiar with these techniques no problem the pattern includes links to helpful tutorial videos to guide you every step of the way **materials** **yarn recommendations** for the popsicle red heart scrubby sparkle fiber content polyester 100% 174 yards/159 meters 3 oz/85 g or any yarn that knits to gauge and for the popsicle stick red heart scrubby fiber content polyester 100% 78 yards/71 meters 3 oz/85 g or any yarn that knits to gauge **sample used the following quantities of yarn in the named colorways below ** **cc1 ** red heart scrubby sparkle in blueberry 2 6 11 yards/2 6 10 meters one ball **cc2 ** red heart scrubby sparkle in strawberry 2 6 11 yards/2 6 10 meters one ball **cc3 ** red heart scrubby sparkle in marshmallow 2 6 11 yards/2 6 10 meters one ball **cc4 ** red heart scrubby prints in almond 2 yards/2 meters one ball **knitting needles** us size 7/4 5 mm or size used to match gauge - straight or circular as you prefer dpn s or circular for knitting the i-cord **notions** locking stitch markers 3 scissors tapestry needle **gauge** 19 sts x 30 row over 4 /10 cm in pattern stitch worked flat **size information** s m l etc **finished measurements** 2 25x4 3 25x5 4x7 25 inches or 5 5x10 8 5x12 5 10x18 5 centimeters hope you enjoy knitting this scrubby 1 https //www ozzylosiknitdesigns com/summer-of-scrubbies-2025/
